data.title: The Official Victoria's Secret Thread
data.text:
2 hours ago, Clauds said:

Is this Lais' first solo press event?

Didn't she also do one last year? From the TLaA series? I remember JoJa were at the Dogpound, and they also did it on FB Live. Adriana was boxing and I think Lais did another event too... (She didn't...)

Edit: Never mind, I think it was Elsa doing some yoga or something like that, Martha had her own event too, with Body by Simone... The videos are no longer available on Facebook...

2nd Edit: The locations are 305 Fitness, Dogpound, Ballet Beautiful, and Tracy Anderson Method.

5 hours ago, Fuka said:

Lais does not have an anorexic body. She is very tall with beautiful proportions but she isn't huge

Where do you see anything about anorexia?? I didn't say anything about that. And I said huge as in super tall and big compared to the other girl. She is slim and has nice proportions but is big boned, especially when you compare her to other models such as Sara Sampaio or Stella Maxwell. And no big boned does not mean fat, before anyone tries to put words in my mouth.

GotPortugal's 'VS Angel Social Media Report:

Current Number of IG followers

Candice Swanepoel 11,372,855 ( not decreasing!)

Adriana Lima 11,242,199

Taylor Hill 9,011,603

Alesandra Ambrosio 8,673,156

Sara Sampaio 5,878,734

Lily Aldridge 5,111,047 (decreasing)

Behati Prinsloo 5,141,896

Josephine Skriver 4,278,449

Elsa Hosk 3,831,908

Romee Strijd 3,421,386

Stella Maxwell 3,308,731

Martha Hunt 2,709,387

Jasmine Tookes 2,273,425

Lais Ribeiro 1,256,667

Ale and Adriana have barely improved in a month. Stella reached 3.3m. Romee hit 4.4m. Taylor hit 9million!! One step closer to Adriana and Candice. Sara hit 5.8m and on her way to 6m.

(Past Month Gain)

Sara Sampaio (138k) +16

Taylor Hill (115k) -68

Stella Maxwell (101k) -10

Jasmine Tookes (50k) -55

Josephine Skriver (59k) -23

Romee Strijd (31k) -33

Elsa Hosk (33k) -24

Lais Ribeiro (35k) -19

Adriana Lima (11k) -23

Martha Hunt (19k) -14

Candice Swanepoel (6k) -5

Behati Prinsloo (33k) +32

Alessandra Ambrosio (15k) +11

Lily Aldridge (-11k) -7

Lais is down from last month, and even with baby stuff, Behati could only muster a 35k growth. Sara won over Taylor this month, but I expect that to change already soon.

[highest number of likes in a picture] (Average amount of likes)

Taylor Hill [741.5k] (355k)

Candice Swanepoel [936**] (204k)

Sara Sampaio [575.7k] (204k)

Behati Prinsloo [827k**] (290k**)

Adriana Lima [544.5k] (146k)

Josephine Skriver [321.5k] (181k)

Romee Strijd [256.9k] (165k)

Alessandra Ambrosio [390.2k*] (113k)

Elsa Hosk [257.4k] (130k)

Stella Maxwell [182.2k] (84k)

Jasmine Tookes [165.3k*] (77k)

Lily Aldridge [191.5k*] (60k)

Martha Hunt [116k] (71k)

Lais Ribeiro [71k*] (28k)

Peak for Martha, altough Lais goes from one of her best months to one of the worst of this year. Adriana down too. Candice down a lot again. Sara had a tough month on likes on the contrary to what her follows would have indicated.

*These are all VSFS related pictures

**BABY GALORE

WINNERS:

LOSERS:

Be back in October.

PS. I'm having a buttload of formatting issues for this. So If there's any mistake you find like in a name or something let me know.

Honestly, from where I see things....Lais and Jas having the least followers has nothing to do with the colour of the skin. It's just how they handle their accounts. I have followed Lais's Instagram on and off she just doesn't come across as someone very into social media. I am sure she understands she needs to cultivate some sort of buzz so she has to post stuff on and off for the fans ... Like if it was upto her she would post once in a blue moon. That's the vibe I get from her.

Coming to Jas, I don't have any idea because I don't follow her and I went to her page and tried to find a reason for the low count as she is more adored than Martha but I can't point to anyone thing ?! Maybe she posts a lot?! IDK. Someone who has an idea can elaborate.

Coming to Taylor and Sara, both are equally stunning and seem quite into keeping their instagram active but Taylor was all over the place last season on hf and just happened to gain followers quickly and has managed to keep them intrested enough. Like only a big stunt like an FB could up Sara's follower number to compete with Taylor.
